p: The genus Lippia (Verbenaceae) includes approximately 200 species of herbs, shrubs, and small trees, most of which are distributed in the Neotropical region [ 1]. Brazil is the center of diversity of the genus, containing 98 species with a high degree of endemism, more than half of which is located in the Serra do Espinha√ßo in the state of Minas Gerais [ 2].
